Content: <icon id='Target_CripplingBlow'/>[Key:Target_CripplingBlow_DisplayName] deals additional <font color='#CD1F1F'>piercing damage</font> to disabled targets.

<icon id='MultiStrike_BlinkStrike;LLWEAPONEX_MASTERYBONUS_VULNERABLE' type='1;2'/>[Key:MultiStrike_BlinkStrike_DisplayName] applies [Key:LLWEAPONEX_MASTERYBONUS_VULNERABLE_DisplayName] to targets hit. [Key:LLWEAPONEX_MASTERYBONUS_VULNERABLE_DisplayName] lasts until the end of your turn, and deals a one-time amount of bonus damage on hit.<icon id='LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Axe_Savage_DisplayName;LLWEAPONEX_MB_Axe_Savage' type='3'/>[Key:LLWEAPONEX_MB_Axe_Savage]
<icon id='Shout_Whirlwind'/>Keep spinning when using [Key:Shout_Whirlwind_DisplayName], dealing reduced damage per spin.

<icon id='Target_Flurry'/>Each hit with [Key:Target_Flurry_DisplayName] cleaves in a small cone.<icon id='LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Axe_Stalker_DisplayName,LLWEAPONEX_MB_Axe_Stalker' type='3'/>[Key:LLWEAPONEX_MB_Axe_Stalker]

<icon id='Rush_BatteringRam;Rush_BullRush'/>If under the effects of War Charge, deal 25% more damage and gain Hasted after using a rush skill.<icon id='Shout_InspireStart'/>Fear, Madness, and Sleep are cleansed from encouraged allies.

<icon id='Target_Harmony'/>[Key:Target_Harmony_DisplayName] causes allies affected to attack the nearest enemy with a basic attack.<icon id='Shout_GuardianAngel'/>Slain allies who were affected by [Key:GUARDIAN_ANGEL_DisplayName] are resurrected when your turn ends.

<icon id='Shout_Whirlwind;Dome_LLWEAPONEX_Banner_Rally_DivineOrder;Dome_LLWEAPONEX_Banner_Rally_Dwarves'/>If near an active banner, enemies hit by [Key:Shout_Whirlwind_DisplayName] are pulled towards the banner.<icon id='LLWEAPONEX_MASTERYBONUS_BANNER_LEADERSHIPBONUS' type='2'/>Allies affected by [Handle:hbcbab273g6573g4b68g810cgae231a342df0:Leadership] now have a chance to gain [Key:LLWEAPONEX_MASTERYBONUS_BANNER_LEADERSHIPBONUS_DisplayName] when nearby.
<icon id='Dome_LLWEAPONEX_Banner_Rally_DivineOrder;Dome_LLWEAPONEX_Banner_Rally_Dwarves'/>Placed banners now grant additional defensive benefits, including Flanking Immunity.

<icon id='Target_LLWEAPONEX_BasicAttack;LLWEAPONEX_CONCUSSION' type='1;2'/>Basic attacks have a [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Hit_BattleBook_ConcussionChance]% chance to give the target a Concussion for [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Hit_BattleBook_ConcussionTurns] turn(s).
<icon id='Rush_BatteringRam'/>[Key:Rush_BatteringRam_DisplayName] has a 25% chance to apply Dizzy for 1 turn.
<icon id='Target_CripplingBlow'/>[Key:Target_CripplingBlow_DisplayName] applies Sundered, reducing max Physical and Magic Armor by 25%.
<icon id='Cone_GroundSmash'/>[Key:Cone_GroundSmash_DisplayName] creates a localized quake at the point of initial impact, dealing bonus damage in a 3m radius.
<icon id='Projectile_PinDown'/>[Key:Projectile_PinDown_DisplayName] shoots [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Bow_PinDownBonusShots] arrow(s), hitting a random nearby enemy for half damage.
<icon id='Projectile_Snipe'/>[Key:Projectile_Snipe_DisplayName] does deals a guaranteed unmissable critical hit to [Key:MARKED_DisplayName] targets.
<icon id='Projectile_SkyShot'/>[Key:Projectile_SkyShot_DisplayName] deals a guaranteed critical hit to targets that are Knocked Down.
<icon id='Projectile_ThrowingKnife'/>[Key:Projectile_ThrowingKnife_DisplayName] is enhanced with a chance to do bonus damage.

<icon id='MultiStrike_Vault'/>Using [Key:MultiStrike_Vault_DisplayName] on a target hit by [Key:Projectile_ThrowingKnife_DisplayName] grants bonus AP and refreshs the cooldown of [Key:Projectile_ThrowingKnife_DisplayName].<icon id='Target_SerratedEdge'/>Deal bonus damage if the target is [Key:BLEEDING_DisplayName].

<icon id='Projectile_FanOfKnives'/>The bonuses for [Key:Projectile_ThrowingKnife_DisplayName] and [Key:MultiStrike_Vault_DisplayName] apply to all projectiles thrown by [Key:Projectile_FanOfKnives_DisplayName].

<icon id='Target_Fatality'/>[Target_Fatality_DisplayName] now deals piercing damage, refunds source and partial AP costs on kill, and has a [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Dagger_FatalityCooldown] turn cooldown.<icon id='Target_TerrifyingCruelty'/>The corpses of targets killed explode for bonus damage, which can cause additional explosions on kill.
<icon id='Rush_BatteringRam;Rush_BullRush'/>You are immune to surface damage while using rush skills.
<icon id='Jump_TacticalRetreat'/>After using [Key:Jump_TacticalRetreat_DisplayName], your next action's AP cost is reduced by [Stats:Stats_LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Firearm_Tactics:APCostBoost].
<icon id='Projectile_Ricochet'/>Each ricochet bounce deals splash damage in a [Stats:Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Greatbow_Ricochet:ExplodeRadius]m radius.

<icon id='Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbow_Shoot'/>Hand Crossbow attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbowMasteryBoost1]% extra base damage in total.<icon id='Shout_Whirlwind'/>While spinning, shoot 1-3 enemies in a 6m radius.

<icon id='Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbow_Shoot'/>Hand Crossbow attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbowMasteryBoost2]% extra base damage in total.<icon id='Jump_TacticalRetreat'/>In combat, [Key:Jump_TacticalRetreat_DisplayName] applies [Key:MARKED_DisplayName] to nearby enemies when jumping away.
<icon id='Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbow_Shoot'/>Hand Crossbow attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbowMasteryBoost3]% extra base damage in total.
<icon id='Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbow_Shoot'/>Hand Crossbow attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_HandCrossbowMasteryBoost4]% extra base damage in total.

<icon id='Rush_LLWEAPONEX_Katana_Iaido;LLWEAPONEX_KATANA_COMBO9' type='1;2'/>Basic attacks and weapon skills now apply [Key:LLWEAPONEX_KATANA_COMBO1_DisplayName], a stacking status that is removed when your turn ends. Katana mastery skills consume this status for bonus damage. Backstabs or critical hits apply two stacks.<icon id='MultiStrike_Vault'/>After teleporting, your next attack deals +[ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Katana_VaultDamageBonus]% more damage.

<icon id='Target_LLWEAPONEX_Pistol_Shoot'/>Pistol attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_PistolMasteryBoost1]% extra base damage in total.<icon id='Shout_Adrenaline'/>Gain hyper-focus, increasing the damage of the next shot of your pistol by [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_Adrenaline_PistolDamageBoost]%.

<icon id='Target_LLWEAPONEX_Pistol_Shoot'/>Pistol attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_PistolMasteryBoost2]% extra base damage in total.<icon id='Jump_CloakAndDagger'/>[Key:LLWEAPONEX_MB_Pistol_CloakAndDagger]
<icon id='Target_LLWEAPONEX_Pistol_Shoot'/>Pistol attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_PistolMasteryBoost3]% extra base damage in total.
<icon id='Target_LLWEAPONEX_Pistol_Shoot'/>Pistol attacks deal [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_PistolMasteryBoost4]% extra base damage in total.
<icon id='Target_CripplingBlow'/>[Key:Target_CripplingBlow_DisplayName] deals 25% splash damage around the target in a 3m radius.
<icon id='Rush_BatteringRam;Rush_BullRush'/>After rushing, gain 25% Dodge and deflect the next attack or projectile.

Gain a follow-up combo skill after punching a target.
[ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_SuckerPunch_KnockdownTurnExtensionChance]% chance to increase Sucker Punch's Knockdown by 1 turn.

<icon id='Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Air;Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Earth;Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Fire;Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Poison;Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Water;Shout_LLWEAPONEX_ActivateRuneblade_Chaos'/>The next spell you cast with the same element of your activated rune deals 25% more damage.
<icon id='Shout_Whirlwind'/>[Key:Shout_Whirlwind_DisplayName] consumes bleeding on targets hit to deal a burst of piercing damage. Damage increases for each turn of Bleeding.

<icon id='Shout_Whirlwind'/>Targets hit by [Key:Shout_Whirlwind_DisplayName] have their resistance to your staff's element reduced by [Stats:Stats_LLWEAPONEX_Weakness_Water:WaterResistance]% for [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_ElementalWeaknessTurns] turn(s).
<icon id='Target_CripplingBlow'/>Targets hit by [Key:Target_CripplingBlow_DisplayName] gain a -20% damage debuff until their turn ends. You deal 10% more damage against them until your turn ends.

<icon id='Projectile_Grenade_PoisonFlask;Projectile_Grenade_Molotov;Projectile_Grenade_OilFlask;Projectile_Grenade_WaterBalloon' icon='Item_GRN_PoisonFlask;Item_GRN_Molotov;Item_GRN_OilFlask;Item_GRN_WaterBalloon'/>Basic grenades have a 25% chance to explode again.

<icon id='Target_LLWEAPONEX_UnarmedBasicAttack'/>Unarmed attacks gain [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_UnarmedMasteryBoost1]% extra base damage in total, and scale with your highest base attribute (Strength, Finesse, or Constitution).<icon id='Target_CripplingBlow;Shout_Whirlwind;Rush_BatteringRam'/>Skills that require a melee weapon can now be used while unarmed.<icon id='Target_PetrifyingTouch'/>Petrifying Touch now deals bonus damage and knocks the target back.
Unarmed attacks gain [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_UnarmedMasteryBoost2]% extra base damage in total.
Unarmed attacks gain [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_UnarmedMasteryBoost3]% extra base damage in total.
Unarmed attacks gain [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_UnarmedMasteryBoost4]% extra base damage in total, making it comparable to the damage of a two-handed weapon.

<icon id='Target_LLWEAPONEX_BasicAttack's element by [Stats:Stats_LLWEAPONEX_Weakness_Water:WaterResistance]% for [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_MasteryBonus_ElementalWeaknessTurns] turn(s).<icon id='Shout_FleshSacrifice'/>Allies standing on blood surfaces gain a [Stats:Stats_LLWEAPONEX_BloodEmpowered:DamageBoost]% damage bonus.
